name: book-search-app
description: Automação para rodar frontend, backend e MySQL

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run docker-db" "npm run django-init" "npm run angular"
scripts.docker-db: docker run --name mysql_container -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=root_password -e MYSQL_DATABASE=book_favorites_db -e MYSQL_USER=test_user -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=test_password -p 3306:3306 -d mysql:8.0 || echo 'MySQL container already running'

author: carlosfernandescrypt
